name: Space Arena 3D - shoot glowing enemies
description:
Space Arena 3D is a simple space shooters game with colorful graphic.

Blast down all the opponents and asteroids before they impact on your spaceship - be careful they can appear anywhere. 

It his game you need to shoot down all the enemies spacecrafts and dodge meteor storms in order to survive. shoot down as many enemies as you can and get the highest score.

Features:
-Easy gameplay and control
-Survival mode
-Nice music and sounds
-Leaderboard

Enjoy!
